name: IOUserAudioBox
desc: A container for other audio objects, typically audio devices and audio clock devices.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio box class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of the audio box class.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Frees the audio box.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - GetUID
items.desc: Returns the UID of the audio box.

items.name: - AddDevice
items.desc: Adds an audio device to the audio box.

items.name: - RemoveDevice
items.desc: Removes an audio device from the audio box.

items.name: - AddClockDevice
items.desc: Adds an audio clock device to the audio box.

items.name: - RemoveClockDevice
items.desc: Adds an audio clock device to the audio box.

items.name: - SetIsProtected
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates if the box requires authentication before use.

items.name: - IsProtected
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the box requires authentication before use.

items.name: - HandleChangeAcquireBox
items.desc: Informs the box of a change to its acquisition state.

items.name: - SetIsAcquired
items.desc: Set the box’s acquisition state.

items.name: - IsAcquired
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates the box’s acquisition state.

items.name: - SetIsAcquirable
items.desc: Set the box’s acquirability state.

items.name: - IsAcquirable
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates the box’s acquirabilty state.

items.name: - SetAcquisitionFailure
items.desc: Sets the error code to return when box acquisition fails.

items.name: - GetAcquisitionFailure
items.desc: Returns the error code for use when box acquisition fails.

items.name: - SetHasAudio
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates the box’s audio support.

items.name: - HasAudio
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates the box’s audio support.

items.name: - SetHasVideo
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates the box’s video support.

items.name: - HasVideo
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates the box’s video support.

items.name: - SetHasMIDI
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates the box’s MIDI support.

items.name: - HasMIDI
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates the box’s MIDI support.

items.name: - SetTransportType
items.desc: Sets the box’s transport type.

items.name: - GetTransportType
items.desc: Returns the box’s transport type.
